fluff.name: The Beastheart
entries: 一个半兽人骑在布莱特的背上从沙地里冲出来，跃入空中。他们用大剑在装甲的骷髅中劈出一条路，而他们的坐骑则向相反的方向冲去，在他们身后留下一团骨头粉末。
一个半身人骑在一只绿龙宝宝的背上飞过一片燃烧的森林。狼人嗅着空气，大声叫喊，用爪子指着一条安全的路，引导恐惧的森林生物穿过大火。
在他们的巨型蜘蛛同伴旁边倒着溜达，半精灵覆盖着网的脚让他们牢牢地贴在洞穴的天花板上。下面的强盗们不知道他们的营地已经被渗透了，他们攻击当地定居点的日子已经到头了。
野兽之心是一个冒险家，他与一个野生动物形成了友谊的纽带，并且随着时间的推移，他从这种纽带中获得了力量。作为一个团队，兽心人和他们忠实的伙伴可以进行最危险的冒险，挑战任何怪物，克服任何障碍。

entries.name: Supernatural Bond
entries: 兽心和同伴之间的联系不仅仅是爱和敬佩的关系。它是一种神秘的纽带，使兽心人能够利用他们同伴的愤怒、力量和生存本能。当他们的同伴被激怒时，兽心会将这种凶猛的力量转化为超自然的武术行为。作为回报，野生伴侣可以利用兽心的注意力和方向。

这种超自然的亲属关系可以在很长一段时间内形成。有些兽人在孩童时期就与非正统的宠物或野生保护者结合在一起，随着双方的成长而变得越来越亲密。其他兽心人在荒野中长大，在野生动物中长大，甚至被它们养大，以此来学习尊重和拥抱大自然的力量。但兽心的纽带也可以更快形成，通常是在面临巨大压力的时候。一个在野外迷路和挨饿的人，当他们与一个通过提供食物和庇护所而拯救他们生命的生物联系在一起时，就可能成为兽心。或者，一个受伤并被偷猎者围困的野生生物可以与一个拯救他们生命的角色交好，而这个生物的感激之情也会促成兽心的结合。
不是每个人都能成为兽心，就像不是每个动物都能成为同伴一样。两人必须拥有与生俱来的野性和坚定不移的信任，才能形成这种罕见的友谊。

entries.name: Companions, Not Pets
entries: 大多数兽心人并不希望完全驯服他们的野生朋友，因为这样做会剥夺心爱的同伴的个性和战斗精神。相反，兽心人把自己看作是一个照顾者，照顾一个和自己的心一样猛烈和开放的伙伴。伴侣也有类似的观点，把他们的兽心当作群体的一员，把照顾者当作随时准备探索、狩猎和游戏的兄弟姐妹。

entries.name: Wild at Heart
entries: 在外人看来，兽心人和同伴似乎是平等的（同伴很可能也这么认为！）但兽心人总是意识到，他们的同伴是一种自然力量，而不是一种被驯化的生物。因此，兽心人接受他们的同伴可能没有能力进行深刻的反省，因为大多数同伴都是活在当下，不纠结于过去，而且很少考虑到未来。因此，兽心人有责任为他们自己和他们的野生朋友做这些事情，对同伴负责，就像父母对孩子的关心一样，如果他们所关心的那颗野性的心曾经静止过，他们也会感到悲伤。

entries.name: Untamed Pair
entries: 就像在他们身边跟踪和探索的同伴一样，野兽之心与自然界有着奇妙的联系，使他们能够追踪猎物，在恶劣的环境中生存，甚至与不是他们同伴的野生生物相处。许多兽灵在荒野中是最自在的，他们在星空下睡觉，享受大自然的恩赐。即使兽心人和他们的同伴在城镇中生活，他们的脑海中也常常浮现出定居点外的未被驯服的荒野或定居点下的地下深处，不断召唤他们去冒险。

entries.name: Creating a Beastheart
entries: 当你创造你的兽心人物时，考虑你与你的同伴的友谊历史。你是在小时候发现了这个生物并一起长大的吗？还是你最近才与它们建立起联系？这是你的第一个同伴吗？你是第一个与你的同伴以这种方式结合的人吗？想一想你们成为朋友的时刻和你们已经面临的考验。你们可能一起在荒野中生存，而其中一个人受伤了。你可能从战利品猎人手中救了你的同伴。或者你的同伴可能反而因为击退了一个致命的敌人而救了你的命。
考虑你的同伴的个性和品味。他们是粗野的还是懒惰的？孤僻还是友好？你们可以一起表演什么技巧？你的伴侣最喜欢的食物是什么？你还应该考虑你的伴侣和你在外表或性格上如何互补。你的外貌与他们的外貌是相映成趣还是形成对比？你们都喜欢什么活动？你如何与你的伴侣沟通？你又是如何鼓励他人与你的朋友沟通并表示尊重的？

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: 你可以通过以下建议快速制作一个兽心。首先，让灵巧成为你最高的能力得分（如果你想使用近战武器，则是力量），其次是智慧。第二，选择外乡人的背景。

classFeature.name: Companion
entries: 在1级时，你获得一个同伴生物，在你的冒险中陪伴你，与你一起战斗、探索和生活。你可以选择本补编或其他MCDM补编中的任何同伴。你也可以在MCDM子论坛和MCDM Discord服务器中找到一些很酷的同伴。同伴部分有关于你可以为你的兽心选择的15种同伴生物的信息，以及关于使用同伴的规则的信息（包括凶猛和进入狂暴状态）。
你与同伴的超自然联系将他们的生命与你的生命联系在一起，使你能够帮助你的同伴克服最严重的伤痛。如果你的同伴失去了生命值或已经死亡，你可以花1分钟时间对你同伴的灵魂进行冥想。然后同伴就会恢复所有的命中率，如果他们已经死了，就会恢复生命，而你会获得一个等级的（%0%）。如果同伴的身体被摧毁，他们会在你的5英尺范围内进行改造。
在你获得该等级的等级后，第一次完成长时休息，你可以与你选择的一个新同伴结合，该同伴以GM决定的方式到达你身边5英尺内的一个无人空间。如果你已经有了这个功能的同伴，那么当新同伴到达时，他们就会离开，自生自灭。

classFeature.name: Natural Language
entries: 从1级开始，你可以理解并与你的同伴以及所有野兽和怪兽进行口头交流。这个功能不允许你交流复杂的思想或问题，但你可以做简单的陈述（比如向其他生物表明你对它们没有恶意）或问一些简单的问题（比如最近的水体的位置，或者最近是否有一个具有独特外观的特定个体经过这个地区）。这类生物的知识和意识受到它们智力的限制，而GM则决定一个特定的生物是否有交流的心情。在与使用此功能的野兽或怪兽交谈时，你可以用智慧（动物处理）检查代替魅力检查来影响该生物。

classFeature.name: Primal Exploits
entries: 从2级开始，你学会将你的同伴的愤怒引导到被称为 "原始探索 "的非凡行为中，这些行为由你的同伴的凶猛所推动。
你学会了三种你选择的原始利用，详情如下。每当你在这个等级中获得一个等级，你可以从你所知道的原始利用中选择一个，并用另一个原始利用来代替它，为此你必须拥有相应的兽心等级。
有些漏洞是用你的反应激活的。其他的则是在特定情况下可以使用，但不需要行动。有些漏洞是作为攻击行动的一部分被激活的，在这种情况下，你每回合只能使用一个这样的漏洞。
所有的漏洞都需要你花费你同伴的力量来使用它们。当你使用漏洞时，你的同伴必须在你的60英尺范围内，并且必须拥有至少与漏洞成本相等的凶猛程度。当你使用漏洞时，同伴会失去与成本相等的力量。即使你的同伴是（%0%），你也可以使用漏洞，只要他们有适当的凶猛程度。当你的同伴已经进入狂暴状态时，你不能使用漏洞。
有些漏洞允许同伴进行一次标志性攻击。这种标志性的攻击不能用额外的漏洞来修改，也不能作为猛烈行动的一部分来使用。
当你在2级获得此功能时，或在10级和17级获得新的功能时，你可以采取以下任何一种利用方式。

classFeature.name: Superior Ferocity
entries: 同样在2级的时候，每当你的同伴使用一个需要生物进行能力检查或蓄力的凶猛动作时，同伴可以使用你的原始探索蓄力DC来代替正常DC。

classFeature.name: Companion Bond
entries: 在3级时，你可以选择一种与你的同伴共享的特殊结合。选择凶猛的结合、猎人的结合、地狱的结合、原始的结合、或保护者的结合。

classFeature.name: Master Caregiver
entries: 同样在3级时，你获得对动物处理技能的熟练度。如果你已经熟练掌握了处理动物的技能，那么在你使用该技能进行能力检查时，你的熟练度加成会加倍。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用特技。

classFeature.name: Beyond Instinct
entries: 在5级时，由于你的照顾，你的同伴的坚韧和多才多艺得到了增长。你和你的同伴获得以下好处。

items: 每当你的同伴在你的回合开始时获得凶猛，他们会额外获得1个凶猛。
你的同伴获得对你所选择的一种能力得分的救赎的熟练程度。
你的同伴获得以下技能的熟练度，你可以选择其中一项。杂技，动物处理，运动，恐吓，调查，感知，表演，神机妙算，隐身，或生存。当你的同伴使用调查技能进行能力检查时，可以用智慧代替智力；当他们使用恐吓或表演技能进行能力检查时，可以用力量或灵巧代替魅力。

classFeature.name: Improved Signature Attack
entries: 在5级时，当你的同伴用他们的招牌攻击击中时，攻击会造成一个额外的武器伤害模子。
此外，为了克服对非魔法攻击和伤害的抵抗和免疫，你的同伴的攻击和凶猛行动造成的伤害也算作魔法。

classFeature.name: Faithful Companion
entries: 在第6级时，你与同伴的超自然联系会增长，使你能更快地协调，并能更好地与你的所有盟友一起工作。你不再需要使用你的奖励行动来指挥你的同伴。相反，只要你不是{@condition incapacitated}，你就可以简单地用不需要行动的语言或肢体符号来指挥他们采取一个行动。
此外，当你的同伴在你不在时进入狂暴状态（%0%），并且他们能看到或听到你，他们不会自动向最近的生物移动和攻击。相反，你可以选择同伴在你的回合中移动的位置，以及他们用他们的招牌攻击攻击哪个生物。

classFeature.name: Rejuvenating Ferocity
entries: 同样在6级时，你的同伴可以在战斗中利用自己的怒气来恢复自己的活力。你可以使用一个额外的动作来消耗你同伴的任何数量的怒气，同伴会重新获得与所消耗的怒气相等的命中率。你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次），当你完成一个长时间的休息时，可以重新获得所有的使用。

classFeature.name: Companion Bond Feature
entries: 在第7级时，你从你的同伴契约中获得一个额外的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用特技。

classFeature.name: Primal Strike
entries: 8级时，你获得了为你的武器攻击注入原始能量的能力。在你每个回合中，当你用武器攻击击中一个生物时，你可以使攻击对目标造成额外的1d8伤害。伤害类型由你在获得该特性时决定，并从以下列表中选择：酸、冷、火、闪电、毒或雷。每当你在这个等级中获得一个等级，你可以将这个特征的伤害类型改为列表中的另一个类型。

classFeature.name: Mystic Connection
entries: 在9级时，你与你的同伴的联系会赋予你一种天赋。你的神秘联系的好处取决于你的同伴。如果你获得了一个新的同伴，你的新同伴的神秘连接的好处将取代旧的。
{@bold {@italic Basilisk.}}作为一个额外动作，你的皮肤会被一层灵活的石头覆盖，持续10分钟。在涂上石头时，你对击打、穿刺和砍击伤害有抵抗力。在你完成一次长时间的休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Blood Hawk.}} 作为一个额外动作，你获得一个相当于你行走速度的飞行速度，持续1小时。在你完成一次长时间的休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Bulette.}} 作为一个额外动作，你获得一个相当于你步行速度的钻地速度，持续10分钟。在你完成一次短时或长时休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Deinonychus.}} 你可以采取隐藏行动作为一个额外的行动。你可以使用这个好处的次数等于你的智慧修改器（最少一次），当你完成长期休息时可以恢复所有的使用。
{@bold {@italic Dragon Wyrmling.}}作为一个额外动作，你给你持有的武器注入龙族的力量，持续10分钟。当此力量生效时，使用该武器的攻击会造成额外的1d10伤害，其类型与你的巫妖血统特质有关。在你完成长时间的休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Earth Elemental.}}作为一个额外动作，你的身体会变成泥土和石头，持续10分钟。在这种形态下，你可以穿过由土或石制成的非魔法物体。如果你在一个物体内结束你的回合，你会受到{@damage 1d10}力的伤害，并被分流回你进入该物体的空间。在你完成长时间的休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Gelatinous Cube.}}你的身体变得灵活，呈胶状。作为一个动作或额外动作，你可以将你持有的微小物体吸收到你的身体里，因此其他人无法接触到它。作为一个行动或额外行动，你可以将吸收的物体排泄到你的一只空手中，或让它落在你的脚边。你一次最多可以吸收四个物体。当你死亡时，任何被吸收的物体都会从你的身体里掉出来。
此外，当你周围5英尺内的另一个生物用近战攻击击中你时，你可以使用反应对攻击者造成（%0%）酸液伤害。在你完成短时或长时休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Giant Spider.}}你获得一种次要的感觉，可以警告你有危险。你在主动性卷轴上有优势，而且在你没有丧失能力的情况下，你不能被吓到。
{@bold {@italic Giant Toad.}}你可以屏住呼吸1小时，并获得相当于你行走速度的游泳速度。此外，你可以进行跳远或跳高，就像你有一个跑步起点一样，即使你没有。
{@bold {@italic Giant Weasel.}} 作为奖励动作，你使你的牙齿变成尖锐的黄鼠狼牙，持续1分钟，允许你对你5英尺内的目标进行咬合攻击，作为奖励动作。这是一个自然武器攻击，造成{@damage 1d10}穿刺伤害，可以使用你的力量或灵巧修正值进行攻击和伤害卷。在你完成长时间的休息之前，你不能再次使用这个技能。
{@bold {@italic Hell Hound.}}作为一个额外动作，你将自己笼罩在地狱之火中10分钟。当你以这种方式被笼罩时，5英尺范围内任何以近战攻击击中你的生物或在一个回合内首次触及你的生物都会受到{@damage 2d6}的火焰伤害。在你完成一次长时间的休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。

{@bold {@italic Mimic.}} 作为一个额外动作，你可以触碰一个小型或更小的非魔法物品，并将其多态化为任何其他一般大小和重量相同的非魔法物品，而且其价值不能超过原物品的价值。该物体在1小时内保持多形性，如果你离开该物体超过30英尺，多形性会提前结束，或者你可以选择提前结束它作为一个动作。用任何以这种方式多化的材料作为法术的材料成分会导致该法术失败。在你完成短时或长时的休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Owlbear.}}作为一项行动，你会释放出一个鼓舞人心的叫声。在你30英尺范围内，你选择的每个能听到你的生物都会获得与你的角色等级相等的临时打击点数。在你完成一次长时休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Sporeling.}} 当你用武器攻击击中另一生物时，你为攻击注入特殊孢子，使目标的攻击卷轴处于劣势，直到他们下一回合结束。在你完成短时或长时休息之前，你不能再次使用这个好处。
{@bold {@italic Worg.}}你的行走速度增加10英尺。

classFeature.name: Primal Exploits
entries: 在达到10级时，你可以获得以下探索的机会。

classFeature.name: Beyond Instinct Improvement
entries: 当你达到10级时，你的同伴获得的额外凶猛程度增加到3级。你的同伴获得对你选择的另一种救赎的熟练程度，并获得对上述列表中另一种技能的熟练程度。

classFeature.name: Improved Signature Attack
entries: 11级时，你的同伴的招牌攻击所造成的额外伤害会增加一个骰子，总共有三个伤害骰子。

classFeature.name: Companion Bond Feature
entries: 在11级时，你从你的同伴纽带中获得一个额外的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用特技。

classFeature.name: Loyal to the End
entries: 在13级时，即使是有害的魔法也不能动摇你和你的同伴对彼此和朋友的忠诚度。你和你的同伴不能成为（%0%）或（%1%）。

classFeature.name: Keen Senses
entries: 在14级时，你的感官变得更加敏锐，变得类似于那些可怕的捕食者。你在依靠听觉、视觉或嗅觉的智慧（感知）检查中具有优势。此外，你可以把搜索动作作为一个额外的动作。

classFeature.name: Primal Strike Improvement
entries: 当你达到14级时，你的原始打击的额外伤害增加到（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Beyond Instinct Improvement
entries: 当你达到15级时，你的同伴获得的额外凶猛度增加到5。 你的同伴获得对你所选择的另一种拯救方式的熟练度，并获得对上述列表中另一种技能的熟练度。

classFeature.name: Companion Bond Feature
entries: 在15级时，你从你的同伴纽带中获得一个额外的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用特技。

classFeature.name: Primal Exploits
entries: 在达到17级时，你可以获得以下探索的机会。

classFeature.name: Improved Signature Attack
entries: 17级时，你的同伴的招牌攻击所造成的额外伤害会增加一个骰子，总共有四个伤害骰子。

classFeature.name: Summon the Wilds
entries: 在18级时，你可以召唤出附近的生物作为分散注意力的蜂群。根据你的位置，这个部落可以由鸟类、鱼类、昆虫、啮齿动物或其他你选择的类似生物组成。作为一个动作，你呼唤这些生物，它们会立即到达并占据一个30英尺的立方体，以你能看到的120英尺内的一个点为中心。虫群持续1分钟。在你的每个回合中，你都可以使用一个额外的行动来将虫群向任何方向移动最多30英尺。
你所选择的每一个生物，在开始他们的回合时，必须用智慧救赎来对抗你的利用救赎DC，否则在能力检查、攻击卷和救赎上都会处于劣势，并且他们的被动智慧（感知）得分会受到-5的惩罚，直到他们下一个回合开始。
在你完成短期或长期休息之前，你不能再次使用这个功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用特技。

classFeature.name: Unbreakable Friendship
entries: 在20级时，你对你的同伴的感情和友谊给这个生物注入了原始的能量，使他们成为同类的典范。当你至少有1个命中率并且你的同伴能看到或听到你时，你和你的同伴获得以下好处。

items: 你在智慧（动物处理）检查中自动成功，以防止你的同伴进入狂暴状态。(如果你想让你的同伴故意进入狂暴状态，你可以选择不做检查）。
如果你的同伴被降低到0点命中率但没有被彻底杀死，他们反而会下降到1点命中率。
每当你掷出主动权时，你的同伴就会获得（%0%）的凶猛。

optionalfeature.name: Aid Us, Friend (3 Ferocity)
entries: 每当你采取攻击行动时，你都可以激活这个漏洞。在你攻击之前或之后，你的同伴可以采取帮助行动作为一个额外的行动。

optionalfeature.name: Bring Them Down (4 Ferocity)
entries: 当你的同伴用他们的招牌攻击击中一个生物时，你可以用你的反应来命令同伴把目标拽下来。目标必须在力量救赎中成功，否则就会倒下（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Drag Them (4 Ferocity)
entries: 当你的同伴用他们的招牌攻击击中一个大型或小型生物，并且同伴和目标都站在地面上时，你可以用你的反应来命令你的同伴移动该目标。目标必须做一个力量救赎的动作。如果失败，同伴会在你选择的任何方向上移动至其行走速度的一半，并拉着目标一起移动。

optionalfeature.name: Feral Reflexes (2 Ferocity)
entries: 当你或你的同伴被攻击击中时，你可以使用你的反应来增加目标的AC值2，以对抗触发的攻击。

optionalfeature.name: Hurricane Blow (3 Ferocity)
entries: 每当你采取攻击行动时，你都可以激活这个漏洞。本回合你第一次用武器攻击击中一个生物时，攻击会产生正常的效果，并且你可以将目标推到离你最远的10英尺。

optionalfeature.name: No Escape (1+ Ferocity)
entries: 在你的回合开始时，当你的同伴获得凶猛而没有进入狂暴状态时，你可以在凶猛中花费你的智慧修改器（最少1；不需要行动）。直到你下一个回合开始时，你的速度或你同伴的速度（你选择）增加5英尺×所花费的凶猛程度。

optionalfeature.name: Primal Pounce (3 Ferocity)
entries: 当你的同伴用他们的招牌攻击击中一个生物时，你可以用你的反应来命令同伴抓取目标。目标必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作。一旦失败，同伴就会抓住目标，而目标会被{@condition grappled}（逃脱DC等于你的利用救赎DC）。如果你的同伴攻击目标以外的生物，抓捕也会结束。

optionalfeature.name: Quick Hide (2 Ferocity)
entries: 每当你采取攻击行动时，你都可以激活这个漏洞。本回合你第一次用武器攻击击中一个生物时，如果你的同伴能够躲藏，他们可以采取隐藏动作作为反应。

optionalfeature.name: Thrash (4 Ferocity)
entries: 当你的同伴用近身攻击击中一个大型或小型生物时，你可以用你的反应来命令同伴将目标从一边打到另一边，迫使他们做一个智慧救赎动作。如果失败，目标在攻击卷中处于劣势，而对目标的攻击卷则具有优势，直到你下一个回合开始。

optionalfeature.name: Crushing Charge (8 Ferocity)
entries: 作为一个动作，你在一条直线上以你的速度移动，而不会引起机会攻击。你可以在其他生物的空间中移动，但必须在一个无人的空间中结束你的移动。除了你的同伴之外，你移动过的空间中的每个生物都必须做一个力量救赎动作。如果失败，生物会受到{@damage 4d6}重击伤害并被击倒{@condition prone}。成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会被击倒（%2%）。
当你达到17级时，伤害增加到（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Expanding Fury (6 Ferocity)
entries: 当你的同伴使用凶猛行动影响到同伴特定距离内的生物时，你可以使用你的反应将该距离扩大10英尺。

optionalfeature.name: Furious Vengeance (5 Ferocity)
entries: 当一个生物用近战攻击击中你或你的同伴时，你可以用你的反应对攻击者造成（%0%）的精神伤害。
当你达到17级时，伤害增加到（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Marked Prey (4 Ferocity)
entries: 当你的同伴使用一个需要生物做出救赎动作的凶猛动作时，你可以使用你的反应在救赎上施加不利条件。

optionalfeature.name: Primal Shout (6 Ferocity)
entries: 作为一个动作，你释放出威胁性的吼声。在你周围15英尺内能听到你的每个生物都必须在智慧救赎中成功，否则就会变成你的（%0%），直到你下一回合结束。

optionalfeature.name: Wrath of the Pack (4 Ferocity)
entries: 当你用攻击击中一个生物，并且该生物在你同伴的5英尺范围内，你可以让你的同伴对该生物进行一次签名攻击（不需要行动）。一旦命中，攻击会产生正常效果，目标会被击倒（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Blood Sport (16 Ferocity)
entries: 当你用近战武器攻击击中大型或小型生物时，你还可以将目标推到离你最远的30英尺处，并将其击倒（%0%）。如果目标在你同伴的5英尺范围内结束这个动作，同伴可以对目标进行一次签名攻击（不需要行动）。一旦命中，攻击会产生正常的效果，并且目标会被推到离你的同伴最远的30英尺处。如果目标在你5英尺范围内结束这个动作，你可以对他们进行一次近战武器攻击（不需要行动），如果命中会造成额外的（%1%）伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Break the Earth (14 Ferocity)
entries: 作为一个动作，你在60英尺范围内的地面、地板或其他表面上打开一个半径为10英尺的坑。坑可以达到50英尺深，这取决于它被打开的地表下的深度。当坑打开时，站在该区域的每个生物必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作。如果失败，生物就会掉进坑里，每下降10英尺受到{@damage 1d6}重击伤害，并落地{@condition prone}。如果成功，该生物会移动到他们选择的坑边上的一个无人空间。一个生物可以爬上坑的粗糙墙壁，而不需要进行能力检查。

optionalfeature.name: Bury the Dead (16 Ferocity)
entries: 当你和你的同伴在一个生物的5英尺范围内时，你可以使用一个动作，使一个充满碎石和泥土的恶性旋风在该生物周围升起，该生物必须做一个灵巧的救命动作。如果失败，该生物会受到{@damage 8d6}的重击伤害，被击倒{@condition prone}，并被{@condition restrained}。成功时，目标会受到一半的伤害，并且不会被击倒（%3%）或（%4%）。这样的生物{@condition restrained}可以用一个动作对你的利用救赎DC进行力量(运动)检查，成功后可以释放自己。

optionalfeature.name: Imbue Projectile (14 Ferocity)
entries: 作为一个动作，你进行一次远程武器攻击。无论攻击是否命中，一道能量波都会从攻击中使用的武器或弹药中爆发出来，以你的目标为中心。在目标20英尺范围内的每个生物（包括目标，不包括你的同伴）必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作，如果蓄力失败，将受到（%0%）力量伤害，如果蓄力成功，将受到一半的伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Rend (12 Ferocity)
entries: 作为一个行动，在你和你的同伴的5英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。你对目标进行一次近战武器攻击，你的同伴对目标进行一次签名攻击（不需要行动），如果你们都击中并对目标造成伤害，则目标被击倒（%0%），并受到任何一次攻击造成的额外（%1%）的伤害（你选择）。

optionalfeature.name: Spirit Form (14 Ferocity)
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你可以让你和你的同伴变成无体状态，直到你下一个回合结束。在无体状态下，你们每个人都能抵抗酸、冷、火、闪电和雷电伤害，以及来自非魔法攻击的击打、穿刺和切割伤害。在无体状态下，你和你的同伴各自获得一个相当于你们各自行走速度的飞行速度，并且你们每个人都可以在其他生物和物体中移动，就像它们是困难的地形一样。如果你在一个物体内结束你的回合，你们中的任何一个人都会受到（%0%）武力伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Drain Them (4 Ferocity)
entries: 当你的同伴用他们的招牌攻击击中另一个生物时，你可以用你的反应让你的同伴重新获得相当于所受伤害一半的打击点数。

optionalfeature.name: Hellish Wound (4 Ferocity)
entries: 当你的同伴用他们的攻击击中另一个除构装体或亡灵以外的生物时，你可以让攻击对该生物造成一个地狱般的伤害（不需要行动）。在他们每个回合开始时，有地狱之伤的目标每有一个地狱之伤就会失去（%0%）的命中率。如果目标接受了魔法治疗，或者如果任何生物使用行动，通过成功的智慧（医学）检定来抑制伤口，其DC等于你利用的救赎DC，那么目标的所有地狱般的伤口都会关闭。

optionalfeature.name: Infernal Teleport (4 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, you or your companion (your choice) are surrounded by swirling shadow and smoke. The target teleports to an unoccupied space within 90 feet of their starting position.

optionalfeature.name: Wicked Deception (3 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, choose a creature hostile to you that you can see within 30 feet of you. That creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or suddenly view you and your companion as friends until the end of your next turn. While in this state, the creature is unable to attack or otherwise harm you or your companion. This effect ends early if you or your companion attacks the affected creature. Creatures immune to the {@condition charmed} condition can't be affected by this exploit.

optionalfeature.name: Brimstone Teleport (8 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, you teleport to an unoccupied space that you can see within 30 feet of you. Each creature within 5 feet of the space you leave and each creature within 5 feet of your destination space must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 4d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. You and your companion take no damage from this effect.
当你达到17级时，伤害增加到（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Chains from Hell (8 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, you manifest fiery chains that attempt to wrap around up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is {@condition restrained} until the end of your next turn. On a success, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}.
当你达到17级时，伤害增加到（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Dark of Hell (8 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, you cause your companion to radiate an aura of magical darkness in a 10-foot radius until the end of your next turn. You and your companion can see within this darkness, which moves with your companion.

optionalfeature.name: Infernal Flames (8 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, you cause a blast of fire to erupt from your companion. Each creature within 20 feet of the companion must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 4d10} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. You and your companion take no damage from this effect.
当你达到17级时，伤害增加到（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Poison Rain (8 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, you cause toxic green rain to fall in a 20-foot cube centered on a point you can see within 60 feet of you. Each creature in the area except for you and your companion must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Shield (3 Ferocity)
entries: When a creature you can see within 30 feet of you takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can use a reaction to give the affected creature resistance to that damage type (including against the triggering attack) until the end of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Freezing Strike (2 Ferocity)
entries: You can activate this exploit whenever you take the Attack action. The first time you hit a creature with a weapon attack this turn, the attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} cold damage and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
The extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Sickening Strike (3 Ferocity)
entries: You can activate this exploit whenever you take the Attack action. The first time you hit a creature with a weapon attack this turn, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Wings When I Need Them (5 Ferocity)
entries: At the start of your turn when your companion gains ferocity and doesn't enter a rampage, you can manifest a spectral eagle (no action required) that lifts you or your companion (your choice) to the sky. The target gains a flying speed equal to their walking speed until the start of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Lava Geyser (8 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, you summon a powerful rush of lava centered on a point on the ground you can see within 30 feet of you. The lava fills a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 5-foot radius, and forces each creature in its area to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}. The lava then dissolves into fiery mist and fades away.
当你达到17级时，伤害增加到（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Eruption (8 Ferocity)
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra {@damage 5d6} lightning damage and you can choose one other creature within 30 feet of the target that you can see. That creature must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 5d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
When you reach 17th level, both instances of damage increase to {@damage 6d6}.

optionalfeature.name: Plant Prison (5 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, choose a creature you can see within 30 feet of you. Thorny vines erupt from the ground beneath the target, which must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage 4d6} piercing damage and is {@condition restrained} until the start of your next turn. On a success, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}.
当你达到17级时，伤害增加到（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Stinging Swarm (6 Ferocity)
entries: As an action, you conjure a swarm of stinging insects in a line that is 5 feet wide and 30 feet long. Each creature in the line except your companion must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 4d6} piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The insects then dissolve to shadow and fade away.
当你达到17级时，伤害增加到（%0%）。

optionalfeature.name: Thunderous Rebuke (6 Ferocity)
entries: When you or your companion is hit with a melee attack by a creature within 5 feet of that target, you can use your reaction to force the attacker to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the attacker takes {@damage 3d6} thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from the target. On a success, the attacker takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.
When you reach 17th level, the damage increases to {@damage 4d6}.

subclassFeature.name: Ferocious Bond
entries: Some beasthearts and companions feel closest when they abandon all control and let instinct guide their every move. When your companion enters a rampage, you feel every moment of their brutality, inspiring you to a battle fury all your own.

entries.caption: Ferocious Bond Features
rows: Frenzied Charge, Fury of the Wise

subclassFeature.name: Frenzied Charge
entries: Starting when you choose this bond at 3rd level, you learn to follow your companion's furious lead. Whenever your companion enters a rampage, you can use a reaction to move up to your speed and make a melee weapon attack against a target at the end of the movement.

subclassFeature.name: Fury of the Wise
entries: Also at 3rd level, your experience with your companion's rage awes those who dare stand against you. You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill if you do not already have it. Additionally, your Charisma (Intimidation) checks gain a bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Energizing Rampage
entries: At 7th level, your companion maintains their tenacity after going berserk. When your companion ends a rampage, their ferocity drops to 4 instead of 0.

subclassFeature.name: Furious Rampage
entries: At 11th level, your companion can channel their fury into stronger strikes. Whenever your companion hits one of your enemies with a signature attack during a rampage, the attack deals extra damage equal to the companion's ferocity (instead of half their ferocity).

Additionally, whenever your companion attacks a target within 5 feet of you while in a rampage, they make the attack with advantage. If you attack a creature within 5 feet of your companion when you use Frenzied Charge, you make your attack with advantage.

subclassFeature.name: Invigorated Rampage
entries: At 15th level, you and your companion can channel your anger into overwhelming strikes. When your companion hits another creature with their signature attack while in a rampage, or if you hit another creature with the attack granted to you by Frenzied Charge, the target is either {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, or {@condition frightened} of the attacker (your choice) until the end of the target's next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter Bond
entries: You and your companion share a love of the hunt. The pair of you are silent stalkers working together to take down prey of all sizes, whether to feed your friends or to destroy your enemies. Many beasthearts with this bond use ranged weapons to attack prey from afar while their companion closes in for the kill.

subclassFeature.name: Chosen Quarry
entries: Starting when you choose this bond at 3rd level, you and your companion can single out a creature as your prey. Whenever your companion gains ferocity at the start of your turn and doesn't enter a rampage, you can spend 4 ferocity to mark a creature within 90 feet of you (no action required). That creature becomes your quarry for 1 minute, or until you use this feature to mark another target as your quarry. Whenever you or your companion hit your quarry with a weapon attack or deal damage to them with a ferocity action, the quarry takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter's Instincts
entries: At 3rd level, your instincts improve, making you a formidable tracker and granting you better intuition. You gain proficiency in the Survival skill if you do not already have it. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make using that skill, and you can use Survival instead of Insight when you make a Wisdom check to read a creature's intentions or discern if a creature is lying.

subclassFeature.name: Primal Warding
entries: At 7th level, you learn to use primal magic to set traps made of nearly invisible force. As an action, you trap a 10-foot-square area of ground centered on a point you can see within 30 feet of you, with the trap lasting for 8 hours or until it is triggered. When you set the trap, you can designate any number of specific creatures that are unaffected by it. Finding the trap requires a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your exploit save DC.

A creature that walks into the trap's area triggers the trap and must make a Constitution saving throw against your exploit save DC. On a failure, the creature takes {@damage 4d8} force damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}. A creature {@condition blinded} by the trap can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on themself on a success.

A mental alarm alerts you with a ping in your mind if you are within 1 mile of the trap when it is triggered. This ping awakens you if you are sleeping. If you set more than one trap, you know which one was triggered.
You can use this feature to set a number of traps equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum one). You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Synchronized Stealth
entries: At 11th level, you and your companion learn to become unseen at the same time in the blink of an eye. When either you or your companion takes the Hide action, the other can take the Hide action as a reaction if they are able to hide. Additionally, when you take the Hide action within 5 feet of your companion, you have advantage on the Dexterity (Stealth) check made as part of the action.

subclassFeature.name: Unseen Hunters
entries: At 15th level, you can use an action to make you and your companion {@condition invisible} for 10 minutes. While {@condition invisible}, neither of you can be tracked by nonmagical means unless you or your companion chooses to leave a trail. Either of you can end the invisibility on yourself as a bonus action. Once you use this feature, you can use it again when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Infernal Bond
entries: You and your companion share a deep connection with each other... and with the Seven Cities of Hell! It might be that you work in the service of a devil, that you both spent time imprisoned in Hell before clawing your way out together, or simply that you bonded with a fiendish companion born in the Lower Planes. Whatever the case, you are connected to the Seven Cities and can use your companion's ferocity to unlock infernal magic.

subclassFeature.name: Devil's Understanding
entries: Starting when you choose this bond at 3rd level, you can speak, write, and understand Infernal.
Additionally, you gain proficiency in the Arcana or Religion skill (your choice) if you do not already have proficiency in those skills.

subclassFeature.name: Infernal Exploits
entries: At 3rd level, you gain one infernal exploit of your choice, which functions in the same manner as your primal exploits and uses your exploit save DC as applicable. The exploit you choose must be one available at 3rd level.
Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can choose one of the infernal exploits you know and replace it with another infernal exploit, for which you must have the appropriate beastheart level.

subclassFeature.name: Hell's Charmer
entries: At 7th level, your companion can harness the supernatural charm of devils to work enchantment magic on other creatures. As an action, choose one creature that can see you and your companion within 30 feet of you. That creature must make a Wisdom saving throw, doing so with advantage if you or your allies are fighting them. On a success, the creature knows you tried to charm them and becomes hostile toward you and your companion. On a failure, the creature is {@condition charmed} by you and your companion for 10 minutes, or until you or your allies do anything physically, mentally, or emotionally harmful to the creature. The {@condition charmed} creature is friendly to you. When this effect ends, a {@condition charmed} creature doesn't remember what happened during the time they were {@condition charmed}.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum once). You regain all uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Fiendish Traits
entries: At 11th level, your companion's connection to Hell causes them to become more fiendish. Choose one of the following traits for your companion:

items.name: {@i Barbed Hide.}
items.entry: Your companion grows barbs all over their body. When a creature within 5 feet of your companion grapples them or hits them with a melee attack, that creature takes {@damage 1d10} piercing damage.

items.name: {@i Fiendish Immunities.}
items.entry: Your companion's skin, fur, or other coloring turns red, and the companion is immune to fire and poison damage and to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

items.name: {@i Fiery Weapons.}
items.entry: Your companion's natural weapons, such as teeth or claws, become sheathed in black fire. Whenever your companion hits with their signature attack, the attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

items.name: {@i Wings.}
items.entry: Your companion sprouts leathery wings from their back and gains a flying speed of 40 feet. If your companion already has wings, those wings take on a fiendish look and their flying speed increases to 40 feet.

entries: Whenever you finish a long rest, you can replace your companion's fiendish trait with another from this list.

subclassFeature.name: Infernal Exploits
entries: You can take one of the following exploits when you gain a new infernal exploit at 11th level:

subclassFeature.name: Fiendish Form
entries: At 15th level, your companion can become a scale-covered child of Hell. As a bonus action, you can spend 6 ferocity to transform your companion into a fiendish form for 1 minute. While in this form, your companion undergoes the following changes:

items: They have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
They have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

subclassFeature.name: Primordial Bond
entries: You and your companion share an especially deep connection with the magic of the natural world. By harnessing the fury of your companion, you can wield the primal power of the elements against your foes.

subclassFeature.name: Nature Exploits
entries: At 3rd level, you gain one nature exploit of your choice, which functions in the same manner as your primal exploits and uses your exploit save DC as applicable. The exploit you choose must be one available at 3rd level.
Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can choose one of the nature exploits you know and replace it with another nature exploit, for which you must have the appropriate beastheart level.

entries.optionalfeature: Wings When I Need Them (5 Ferocity)|BST

subclassFeature.name: Primal Understanding
entries: At 3rd level, you can speak, write, and understand Primordial and Sylvan.
Additionally, you gain proficiency in the Nature skill if you do not already have it.

subclassFeature.name: Allied Earth
entries: At 7th level, the ground around your companion sprouts with vines and plants that hamper foes. Whenever your companion has at least 1 ferocity, the ground within 10 feet of them is difficult terrain for their enemies.

subclassFeature.name: Nature Exploits
entries: You can take one of the following exploits when you gain a new nature exploit at 11th level:

subclassFeature.name: Spirit Stampede
entries: At 11th level, when your companion enters a rampage, they summon the unseen spirits of dead creatures that run wild alongside them. Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of your companion takes force damage equal to the companion's ferocity.

subclassFeature.name: Allied Weather
entries: At 15th level, the weather around your companion answers to your will, battering foes who harm them. Whenever your companion has at least 1 ferocity and is hit with a melee attack by a creature within 10 feet of them, choose one of the following effects:

items: The attacker must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your exploit save DC or fall {@condition prone}.
The attacker must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your exploit save DC or take lightning damage equal to your companion's ferocity.

subclassFeature.name: Protector Bond
entries: Nothing is as important to you and your companion as your pack. The bond you both share sharpens your offensive and defensive prowess, letting you put your bodies and lives on the line to protect your allies and those who travel with you.

subclassFeature.name: Beast Vitality
entries: At 3rd level when you choose this bond, your connection to your companion increases your natural vitality. Your hit point maximum increases by 3, and increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level in this class.

subclassFeature.name: Pack Phalanx
entries: At 3rd level, you and your companion learn to engage foes up close to keep them from harming those you protect. Whenever you and your companion are not {@condition incapacitated} and are both within 5 feet of a creature, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against any target that is not you or your companion.

subclassFeature.name: Thickened Hide
entries: At 7th level, your companion's natural defenses improve, making them harder to hurt. Your companion's AC increases by 2.

subclassFeature.name: Sentinel Companion
entries: At 11th level, your companion's fierce vigilance drives them to attack cowards who attempt to harm other members of your pack. When a creature within 5 feet of your companion makes an attack against a creature other than you or your companion, you can spend 2 ferocity to have your companion use their reaction to make a signature attack against the attacking creature.

subclassFeature.name: Undying Protector
entries: At 15th level, your companion's rage sustains you through grievous injuries and staggering blows. If you can see your companion when you drop to 0 hit points, you can spend 2 ferocity to drop to 1 hit point instead. Each time you use this feature after the first, the ferocity cost increases by 2. When you finish a short or long rest, the ferocity cost resets to 2.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the basilisk has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Poison Spittle (2 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage PB} damage, and a creature the basilisk chooses within 5 feet of them other than the target takes {@damage PB} poison damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Poison Gaze (5 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk chooses up to three creatures they can see within 15 feet of them. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until the start of the basilisk's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Lesser Petrifying Gaze (8 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk targets a creature they can see within 30 feet of them, which must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of their next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 1 hour or until freed by the {@spell lesser restoration|phb} spell or similar magic. (Lesser restoration normally doesn't negate the {@condition petrified} condition, but the companion's Lesser Petrifying Gaze is weaker than other forms of petrification magic.)

reaction.name: Heavy Glare
entries: When the basilisk's caregiver hits a creature that can see the basilisk, the basilisk can force that creature to make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target can't make opportunity attacks and has their speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of their next turn.

hp.special: 6 + 6 times caregiver's level (the hawk has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Beak (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the next attack made against the target before the start of the hawk's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Swooping Attack (5 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or at the end of this move, they can make a signature attack against one target. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or drop one item they are holding.

action.name: 5th Level: Storm of Talons (8 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then can target one creature within 5 feet of them, which must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage (PB)d10} slashing damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of the hawk's next turn. On a success, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition blinded}.

reaction.name: Swoop In
entries: When the hawk is within 30 feet of their caregiver and the caregiver is hit with an attack, the hawk can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the hawk ends this movement within 5 feet of the caregiver, the hawk is hit by the attack instead, and the attack deals half as much damage.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the bulette has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Plated Protection
entries: The bulette's caregiver can ride on the bulette while the bulette burrows.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Violent Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The bulette makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and the bulette can move the target 5 feet in any direction.

action.name: 3rd Level: Burrowing Trip (5 Ferocity)
entries: The bulette moves up to half their burrowing speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Each creature standing on the ground that the bulette moves under must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Deadly Leap (8 Ferocity)
entries: The bulette leaps up to 30 feet, and if they land in a space that contains one or more creatures, each of those creatures must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@damage (PB)d6} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is available, the creature instead is knocked {@condition prone} in the bulette's space.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the deinonychus has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Overwhelming Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The deinonychus makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of the deinonychus's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Clever Girl (5 Ferocity)
entries: The deinonychus can take the {@action Hide} action then make a signature attack, or can make a signature attack then take the {@action Hide} action. If the deinonychus hits with the signature attack, they also knock the target {@condition prone}. The deinonychus can move between their Hide action and the attack, or vice versa, even if such movement would normally negate an attempt to hide.

action.name: 5th Level: Keep Them Down (8 Ferocity)
entries: The deinonychus leaps at another creature within 5 feet of them, which must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage (PB)d12} slashing damage and is knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB}). On a success, the target takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition grappled}. A creature knocked {@condition prone} by this feature can't stand up until they are no longer {@condition grappled}. If the deinonychus attacks or uses Keep Them Down on another target, the grapple ends.

bonus.name: Part of the Pack (1/Long Rest)
entries: When the deinonychus's caregiver is {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition stunned} while within 5 feet of the deinonychus, the deinonychus can end one of those conditions on the caregiver.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the wyrmling has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Draconic Lineage
entries: The wyrmling has a lineage that determines a damage type to which they have immunity and which applies to the damage dealt by their Spit Breath and Breath Weapon actions. See the Draconic Lineages table for more information.

trait.name: Shared Resistance
entries: The wyrmling's caregiver has resistance to the damage type associated with their Draconic Lineage, and takes no damage from the wyrmling's Breath Weapon action.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Spit Breath (2 Ferocity)
entries: The wyrmling makes a signature attack as a ranged weapon attack, with a normal range of 30 feet and a long range of 60 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and all the damage dealt by the attack is of the type associated with the wyrmling's lineage instead of piercing damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Frightful Presence (5 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature of the wyrmling's choice that is within 10 feet of the wyrmling and aware of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the wyrmling for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on themself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for them, the creature is immune to the wyrmling's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: 5th Level: Breath Weapon (8 Ferocity)
entries: The wyrmling exhales elemental energy that fills an area. Creatures in that area must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} saving throw, taking {@damage (PB)d6} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The damage type, area, and type of saving throw are determined by the wyrmling's Draconic Lineage trait.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the elemental has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material they move through. While they use Earth Glide, the elemental can't be used as a mount.

action.name: Slam (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Stretch Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental makes a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and the elemental can pull the target 5 feet toward them.

action.name: 3rd Level: Earthshaker (5 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental strikes the round, and each creature within 10 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The elemental's caregiver automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

action.name: 5th Level: Transmute Ground (8 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental picks a 10-foot-square area of ground they can see within 30 feet of them. Each creature standing in the area must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or partially sink into the ground and become {@condition restrained}. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Strength (Athletics) check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach on a success and ending the {@condition restrained} condition for the freed creature.

bonus.name: Toss Me
entries: While the elemental is within 5 feet of their caregiver, they can hurl the caregiver 5 times PB feet in any direction, including up. If the caregiver would normally take damage from a fall after being thrown, they can negate the damage with a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw.

hp.special: 8 + 8 times caregiver's level (the cube has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Flowing Form
entries: The cube's caregiver can enter a space occupied by the cube without becoming engulfed. While in the same space as the cube, the caregiver can attack and interact with creatures engulfed by the cube without harming or taking damage from the cube.

trait.name: Transparent
entries: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the cube's space while unaware of the cube takes 3 {@damage (1d6)} acid damage and can't enter the space.

action.name: Pseudopod (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} acid damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Burning Acid (2 Ferocity)
entries: The gelatinous cube makes a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and a target that takes damage from the attack can't regain hit points until the start of the cube's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Slime Shower (5 Ferocity)
entries: The cube spins rapidly, raining a shower of sticky, acidic slime around them. Each creature within 5 feet of the cube must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} acid damage and have their speed reduced to 0 until the start of the cube's next turn. The cube's caregiver automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

action.name: 5th Level: Engulf (8 Ferocity)
entries: The cube attempts to pull a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of them into their body. That creature must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target enters the cube's space without provoking opportunity attacks, takes {@damage (PB)d6} acid damage, and is engulfed. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage, doesn't move, and isn't engulfed.

An engulfed creature can't breathe, is {@condition restrained}, and takes {@damage (PB)d6} acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with them. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of their choice within 5 feet of the cube.
The cube can engulf one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures at a time.

hp.special: 6 + 6 times caregiver's level (the spider has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Destabilizing Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The spider makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll they make before the start of the spider's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Web (5 Ferocity)
entries: The spider shoots strands of sticky webs at one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Strength check, bursting the webbing and ending the {@condition restrained} condition on themself on a success.

action.name: 5th Level: Bite Frenzy (8 Ferocity)
entries: The spider makes signature attacks against PB creatures of their choice within 5 feet of them. On a hit, the target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Sticky Stuff (1/Long Rest)
entries: While the spider's caregiver is within 5 feet of it, the spider can coat the bottom of the caregiver's feet or footwear in a selective adhesive. Tis allows the caregiver to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving their hands free and giving the caregiver a climbing speed equal to their walking speed. Te adhesive wears of after 10 minutes.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the toad has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The toad can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and their high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Stretch Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The toad makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage and the toad can pull the target 5 feet toward them.

action.name: 3rd Level: Fast Food (5 Ferocity)
entries: The toad makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the toad can jump up to 20 feet in any direction without provoking opportunity attacks. If the target of the attack is Large or smaller, the toad brings the target with them.

action.name: 5th Level: Swallow (8 Ferocity)
entries: The toad attempts to swallow a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of them, which must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage (PB)d6} bludgeoning damage and is swallowed. On a success, the target takes half as much damage and isn't swallowed.

A swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, they have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and they take {@damage (PB)d6} acid damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.

Whenever the toad takes damage, they must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 5 feet of the toad. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 or half the damage the toad takes, whichever is higher. If the toad is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by the toad and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Psychedelic Skin (1/Long Rest)
entries: While the toad's caregiver is within 5 feet of the toad, the toad can use a bonus action to coat a melee weapon held by the caregiver with poison secreted from the toad's skin. The poison lasts for 1 hour or until the weapon deals damage as part of an attack. When a creature takes damage from the weapon, they must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on themself on a success.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the weasel has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The weasel can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 10 feet of them.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Overwhelming Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The weasel makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of the weasel's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Clamp Down (5 Ferocity)
entries: The weasel makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB}). While {@condition grappled}, the target is {@condition restrained} and the weasel can't bite another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Bite Frenzy (8 Ferocity)
entries: The weasel makes signature attacks against PB creatures of their choice within 5 feet of the weasel. On a hit, the target of the attack is knocked {@condition prone}.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the hound has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Consult Hell
entries: The hound's caregiver can talk to the hound about a specific course of action that the caregiver plans to take within the next 30 minutes, tapping into divinatory power through the hound's connection to the infernal realm. After 1 minute, the hound then gives a response based on its own objective prophetic sense of the outcome: one bark for good results, two barks for bad results, three barks for both good and bad results, and no barks for results that aren't especially good or bad.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Lava Spittle (2 Ferocity)
entries: The hound makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and a creature the hound chooses within 5 feet of them other than the target takes PB fire damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Brutal Charge (5 Ferocity)
entries: The hound can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or at the end of this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

action.name: 5th Level: Fire Breath (8 Ferocity)
entries: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage (PB)d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the mimic has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic can use their action to polymorph into an object or back into their true, amorphous form. Their statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The mimic reverts to their true form if they die.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the next attack made against the target before the start of the mimic's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Adhesive Pseudopods (5 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic attempts to touch each creature of their choice within 5 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB}).

action.name: 5th Level: I'm You (8 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic uses their Shapechanger trait to polymorph into one Large or smaller creature they can see within 5 feet of them, with this form lasting until the start of the mimic's next turn. Other than size, the mimic's statistics do not change. After transforming, the mimic can make a signature attack against the creature whose form they have taken, and that creature must also make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws, and attacks against the creature have advantage, until the start of the mimic's next turn.

bonus.name: Wearable Companion
entries: While the mimic is within 5 feet of their caregiver, the mimic can cover the caregiver's body and take on the appearance of clothing. While wearing the mimic, the caregiver can change the appearance of their clothing at will (no action required) as long as they are not {@condition incapacitated}, and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. Any attack that hits the caregiver also hits the mimic, and vice versa, with both taking the full damage and effect of the attack.

While worn in this way, the mimic can't move or take actions except to revert to their most recent form (a bonus action), which ends the state of being worn by their caregiver. If the mimic enters a rampage, the state of being worn ends immediately. When the mimic is no longer worn by the caregiver, the mimic enters the nearest unoccupied space of their choice.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the owlbear has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Claws (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Violent Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and the owlbear can move the target 5 feet in any direction.

action.name: 3rd Level: Owlie Oop (5 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear leaps up to 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. When they land, each creature within 5 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Bear Hug (8 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear attempts to grab and crush a creature within 5 feet of them that they can see, which must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage (PB)d10} bludgeoning damage and is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB}). On a success, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the target is also {@condition restrained}. The grapple ends if the owlbear uses Bear Hug on another target.

bonus.name: Give a Hoot (1/Long Rest)
entries: The owlbear lets loose a unique battle cry. If the owlbear's caregiver can hear the cry, the caregiver gains 5 times PB temporary hit points.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the sporeling has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the sporeling remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

action.name: Corruption Cough (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6 plus PB} acid damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Destabilizing Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The sporeling makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll they make before the start of the sporeling's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Spore Burst (5 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature of the sporeling's choice within 5 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until the start of the sporeling's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Hallucinogenic Spores (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each enemy within 10 feet of the sporeling must make a {@dc 10 + PB|10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the sporeling chooses whether the target creature uses their reaction to make a melee attack against another creature of the sporeling's choice within the target creature's reach, or whether the target creature falls {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Invigorating Spores (1/Long Rest)
entries: While the sporeling's caregiver is within 30 feet of them, the sporeling can use a bonus action to give the caregiver advantage on saving throws for 1 minute.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the worg has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Move as One
entries: While the worg's caregiver is mounted on the worg, opportunity attacks against the worg or their caregiver are made with disadvantage. The worg's caregiver can mount or dismount the worg by spending 5 feet of movement.

action.name: Bite (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Overwhelming Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The worg makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of the worg's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Brutal Charge (5 Ferocity)
entries: The worg moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or at the end of this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

action.name: 5th Level: Bite Frenzy (8 Ferocity)
entries: The worg makes bite attacks against PB creatures of their choice within 5 feet of them. On a hit, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.

item.name: Badge of Battle +1
entries: This bronze badge depicts a specific type of fearsome creature (a dragon, a wolf, an owlbear, and so forth) leaping into combat against a horde of enemies. While wearing the badge, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls you make with unarmed strikes and natural weapons. Such attacks are considered magical.

entries: This bronze badge depicts a specific type of fearsome creature (a dragon, a wolf, an owlbear, and so forth) leaping into combat against a horde of enemies. While wearing the badge, you gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls you make with unarmed strikes and natural weapons. Such attacks are considered magical.

While wearing the badge, you gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls you make with unarmed strikes and natural weapons. Such attacks are considered magical.

item.name: Badge of Ruin +1
item.reqAttune: by a Beastheart or a Companion
entries: This gold badge glows whenever your companion gains ferocity in combat. If your companion is attuned to the badge and uses a ferocity action that requires another creature to make an ability check or saving throw, the DC of the check or save is increased by +1. While you wear the badge, your exploit save DC increases by +1.

item.name: Badge of Ruin +2
item.reqAttune: by a Beastheart or a Companion
entries: This gold badge glows whenever your companion gains ferocity in combat. If your companion is attuned to the badge and uses a ferocity action that requires another creature to make an ability check or saving throw, the DC of the check or save is increased by +2. While you wear the badge, your exploit save DC increases by +2.

item.name: Badge of Ruin +3
item.reqAttune: by a Beastheart or a Companion
entries: This gold badge glows whenever your companion gains ferocity in combat. If your companion is attuned to the badge and uses a ferocity action that requires another creature to make an ability check or saving throw, the DC of the check or save is increased by +3. While you wear the badge, your exploit save DC increases by +3.

item.name: Beam Lenses
entries: These ruby goggles are attached to the head with black leather straps. While your companion wears the goggles and has 3 ferocity or more, you can spend 3 ferocity on your turn (no action required) and command your companion to use their action to shoot a beam of magical energy from the lenses at a target within 60 feet of them. The companion makes an attack roll with a modifier equal to 3 + your proficiency bonus. On a hit, the attack deals 1d10 + your proficiency bonus force damage.

item.name: Bonded Bracelets
entries: These simple rope bracelets come in pairs. While you and another creature on the same plane are attuned to the bracelets, you always know each other's exact location and can speak telepathically to each other. If the other attuned creature does not understand any language, you understand their emotional state and can give them simple commands.

Additionally, while you and the other attuned creature are within 1 mile of each other, neither of you need to eat or drink, and you can both survive in conditions of extreme cold and extreme heat without gaining levels of {@condition exhaustion}. While you are within 60 feet of each other, you gain any damage resistances or immunities the other creature has, and vice versa.

item.name: Collar of Disguise
entries: While your companion wears this leather collar, you can use an action to speak a command word and polymorph the companion into one of the following creatures: cat, frog, goat, mastiff, mule, owl, rat, or raven. Any equipment the companion is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (your choice). While in this form, your companion retains all their statistics except for size, and they can't use ferocity actions. You can speak the command word again as an action and return your companion to their original form.

item.name: Companion Ball
entries: Images of beasts, monstrosities, and other types of companion creatures are carved on the outside of this 3-inch-radius iron sphere. While you hold the ball and your companion is within 30 feet of you and not in a rampage, you can use an action to speak a command word to transport your companion inside the ball into a cozy, secure extradimensional space. While in the ball, your companion can take a short or long rest, and doesn't need to eat or drink. A {@i companion ball} can hold only one companion at a time.

item.name: Emblem of Elements
entries: This blown-glass emblem looks like a flower with petals of blue, green, red, and yellow. When your companion deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder damage with a signature attack or a ferocity action, you can spend 2 ferocity (no action required) to change the damage type to any other type from that list.

When your companion turns their rage against you, this armor converts your pain into power. While wearing this armor, you have a +1 bonus to AC. Additionally, when you take damage from your companion while they are in a rampage, you take only half as much damage, and the next attack you make before the end of your next turn deals an extra {@damage 2d6} damage if it hits.
